author: Dave Seglins,Linda Guerriero,Laura Clementson
title: Canadian flight crews demand protective suits as more than a dozen fall ill with COVID-19
description: More than a dozen Canadian flight attendants have fallen ill with COVID-19, CBC News has learned. The union representing the country's largest airline says crews need better protective gear.
content:
More than a dozen Canadian flight attendants are sick with COVID-19, with one recently released from an intensive care unit in Calgary, CBC News has learned.
Many airline crews remain on the job as international and domestic flights continue to take thousand… [+4413 chars]
